name: Engineering Project Rubric
description: Comprehensive rubric for evaluating engineering design projects

excellent.description: Clear problem statement with comprehensive requirements analysis. All constraints and specifications identified

good.description: Good problem definition. Most requirements identified

satisfactory.description: Basic problem statement. Some requirements missing

needs_improvement.description: Vague problem definition or incomplete requirements

excellent.description: Thorough literature review. Relevant prior art and existing solutions analyzed

good.description: Good research. Most relevant sources covered

excellent.description: Innovative design with clear rationale. Multiple alternatives considered. Detailed CAD/diagrams. Systematic approach

good.description: Solid design with good justification. Some alternatives considered

excellent.description: Complete implementation. Comprehensive testing protocol. Results well-documented with data
Thorough analysis of results. Meets/exceeds specifications. Performance validated
Professional documentation. Clear technical writing. Excellent figures/tables
